ParameterFields.Name: Which Message ID
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
Affects which message Old Man Ho-Ho says when you talk to him.
Also affects whether Old Man Ho-Ho disappears once a switch is set - see Disable Spawn Switch's tooltip for more information.

ParameterFields.Name: Disable Spawn Switch
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
This parameter is only used for the Old Man Ho-Ho who says message 14010.
The one that says message 14003 uses a hardcoded disable spawn switch of 108.
The one that says message 14006 uses a hardcoded disable spawn switch of 16.
